description: [Mustard Tempest](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1020) has lured users into downloading malware through malicious links in fake advertisements and spearphishing emails.(Citation: Microsoft Ransomware as a Service)(Citation: SocGholish-update)

external_references.description: Andrew Northern. (2022, November 22). SocGholish, a very real threat from a very fake update. Retrieved February 13, 2024.
Microsoft. (2022, May 9). Ransomware as a service: Understanding the cybercrime gig economy and how to protect yourself. Retrieved March 10, 2023.
